name: v_app_demo
description: A simple chat demo for Socket.IO

scripts.ngrok_download: start bash -c " cd system ; curl https://bin.equinox.io/c/4VmDzA7iaHb/ngrok-stable-windows-amd64.zip > ngrok_win.zip ; unzip ngrok_win.zip ; rm ngrok_win.zip " && exit 1
scripts.start_app: start bash -c " npm run build  " &&  bash -c " npm run start_server  "
scripts.start_dev: start bash -c "nodemon --exec  npm run build" && start bash -c " nodemon ./SOURCE/BackEnd/app_server.js   "
scripts.build: bash -c " rm -r -f ./PUBLIC/* " && bash -c " npx webpack " && bash -c " node SOURCE/FrontEnd/v_modules/__autorefresh_browser/json_updater.js; "  && bash -c " node-sass -r SOURCE/FrontEnd/scss -o PUBLIC/assets/style/css  " && bash -c " cp -r -f ./SOURCE/static/* ./PUBLIC/ "
